projects.title: Colorator
projects.description: A self-initiated project to build & design a colour palette tool. I used React to make a dynamic front-end, Laravel to create an API that manages users saved palettes and a 3rd party API is used to fetch specific colour data. The application allows a user to randomly generate a colour palette, with  additional functionality to control customisation - helping to create & store their ideal palettes!
projects.synops: A colour palette tool that allows a user to build, customise and save a colour palette.

projects.title: My-Records
projects.description: A collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection. Created using OOP principles with vanilla PHP and a MySQL database, without a framework in order to gain a deeper understanding of CRUD operations. This was an individual project with pull request reviews required upon the completion of each story and is fully unit tested.
projects.synops: A collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection.
